EmailTemplate.subject: You Are Invited! Honeywell Operators Conference at Smithsonian Air Museum on June 18
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
YOU ARE INVITED! HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE IN WASHINGTON, D.C. Dear Customers and Partners,
We are pleased to invite you to the 2019 Honeywell Operators Conference in Washington, D.C.! This is a great chance to meet the Honeywell team and get your questions answered. We’re just two weeks away and spots are limited, so sign up today!
Date: June 18, 2019 Time: 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. Location: Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center <[[https://airandspace.si.edu/udvar-hazy-center]]> 14390 Air and Space Museum Parkway, Chantilly, Virginia 20151
Attendees will receive an 8-hour credit training certificate.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]> Learn about Honeywell Solutions
We will highlight Honeywell’s hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, supplemental type certificates (STCs) and mandates. Honeywell Support Processes
Get an overview on Honeywell processes and how to make the system work for you. Honeywell staff will share best practices and are ready to answer your questions. Activities
All attendees will get a guided tour with behind-the-scenes stories about some of the most important aircraft in U.S. history at the Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center <[[https://airandspace.si.edu/]]>.
Photo credit: airandspace.si.edu/ <[[https://airandspace.si.edu/]]>
This event is open to all Honeywell customers. Please feel free to share the invitation with your flight department and friends.
We look forward to meeting you in Washington, D.C.!
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]>
Best regards,
Your Customer Core Team Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
